vlive.korean: 피부의 광부터가 좀 달라지는 제품인 것 같아요. It's a product that makes your skin shine differently. 듣기 View video HOONION : 시크릿템 메이크업, 팬밋업 같이 준비해요 🌿 GRWM | 후니언 HOONION
vlive.english: It's a product that makes your skin shine differently.

vlive.korean: [울 루다... 레전드 카드 샀는지... 라바하운드랑 광부는...?] 하지만! [Did she buy a legend card?] [What about the lava hound and miner?] But! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 이루다 모과 좋아요? 그냥 다 좋아요😍 (A date with Luda)
vlive.english: [Did she buy a legend card?] [What about the lava hound and miner?] But!

examples.korean: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 갇힌 광부들을 구출하기 위해 구조원들이 교대를 해 가며 작업을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The rescuers tunnelled their way in to the trapped miners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 구조대원들이 굴을 뚫어 길을 내어 가면서 갇혀 있는 광부들에게로 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rescuers tunnelled their way in to the trapped miners. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was no attempt to recompense the miners for the loss of their jobs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 광부들이 실직한 것에 대해 그들에게 보상을 하려는 어떤 시도도 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was no attempt to recompense the miners for the loss of their jobs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The miners were trapped deep underground. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 광부들은 땅 속 깊은 곳에 갇혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The miners were trapped deep underground. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He went down the pit when he left school. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 학교를 떠난 뒤 광부가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He went down the pit when he left school. Add to Wordbook
